item.title: @FT.RT：一桩罕见的并购案创造了英国领先的房屋建筑商，而新数据显示房地产价格继续上涨，这为因抵押贷款利率上升而受到严重打击的房地产行业带来了新的希望。以下是《颠覆时代
item.description:
A rare bit of M&A to create the UK’s leading housebuilder and new data showing property prices continuing to rise offer new hope for a sector that has been badly hit by higher mortgage rates. Here's Disrupted Times
ft.com/content/afeee310-217a…

item.description: Perella Weinberg banker had €1mn tied up in secret ‘breakfast trust’ trading scheme, court told on.ft.com/495QClQ

item.title:
2022 年，俄罗斯摧毁了半个马里乌波尔。现在，莫斯科想表明它正在重建这座乌克兰城市。
但现实情况却大相径庭。居民们住在危险的半成品房屋中，而俄罗斯公司却从价值数百万美元的合同中获利。
item.description:
In 2022 Russia destroyed half of Mariupol. Now Moscow wants to show it is rebuilding the Ukrainian city.

But the reality is very different. Residents live in dangerous, half-built homes while Russian companies profit from contracts worth millions.

ig.ft.com/mariupol/?segmenti…

item.title: 1 月份，英国房价连续第四个月上涨，创下自 2022 年 10 月以来的最高水平，随着抵押贷款利率的放宽，房地产市场也出现了企稳迹象。
item.description: UK house prices rose for the fourth consecutive month in January to their highest level since October 2022, adding to signs of stabilisation in the property market as mortgage rates ease on.ft.com/49bTLAM
